name: Krokodýl Story: Perspective Specialization Guide
description: Supplement to the main cognitive_framework.json, detailing how specific perspectives manifest in the Krokodýl story. Shows transformation of perspectives in commodification context.

primary_explicit.name: filozofický
primary_explicit.why_key: Central to story's examination of authenticity, meaning, and value
manifestations: Questioning of meaning degradation ('sleva na smysl')
Examination of emotional authenticity in commercial context
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer K (SYSTÉM) rather than base layer C (MEANING) - philosophical questions become systemic economic issues

primary_explicit.name: kulturní
primary_explicit.why_key: Story works with cultural symbols (crocodile tears) and commercial rhetoric
manifestations: Transformation of cultural symbol (crocodile tears) into commercial product
Advertising language as contemporary cultural discourse
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer J (ACTION) rather than base layer L (SYMBOL) - cultural symbols become actions (sale, purchase, consumption)

primary_explicit.name: logický
primary_explicit.why_key: Story presents logical systems of value calculation and commercial exchange
manifestations: '3 za cenu jedné', 'sleva 90%' as logical value propositions
System of emotion commodification with calculable value
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer C (MEANING) rather than base layer D (ENVIRONMENT) - logical systems operate on semantic rather than spatial level

secondary_implicit.name: absurdní
secondary_implicit.why_key: Absurdity of emotion commodification and personified checking instances
manifestations: Crocodile as product with price tag
Absurd contrast between emotional depth and commercial triviality

secondary_implicit.name: psychologický
manifestations: Emotional states activated by button press
Internal conflict between authenticity and availability

secondary_implicit.name: meta
secondary_implicit.why_key: Story comments on systems of meaning and value themselves
manifestations: System of value as subject of analysis

tertiary_present.name: ironický
tertiary_present.why_key: Irony of authentic emotions in commercial packaging

layer_transformations_specific_to_krokod.transformation_description: Philosophical questions about meaning transform into systemic economic issues. Ontology becomes market logic.
layer_transformations_specific_to_krokod.story_evidence: 'Sleva na smysl' - meaning becomes subject to commercial calculation

layer_transformations_specific_to_krokod.transformation_description: Cultural symbols move from representational dimension to become transactional actions. Symbols become commodities with exchange value.
layer_transformations_specific_to_krokod.story_evidence: Crocodile tears transform from cultural symbol to saleable product

layer_transformations_specific_to_krokod.transformation_description: Logical systems move from environmental/spatial organization to operate on semantic level. Logic applies to meaning rather than space.
layer_transformations_specific_to_krokod.story_evidence: Logical calculations ('90% discount') apply to emotions and meaning

perspective_interactions_unique_to_kroko.description: Tension between philosophical depth and commercial superficiality. Authenticity questions vs. market logic.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_kroko.manifestation: Philosophical inquiry into meaning vs. commercial trivialization ('sleva na smysl')

perspective_interactions_unique_to_kroko.description: Conflict between logical commercial systems and absurd emotional commodification. Rational calculation vs. emotional absurdity.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_kroko.manifestation: Precise discount calculations applied to inherently unquantifiable emotions

perspective_interactions_unique_to_kroko.description: Meta-reflection on psychological commodification creates new emotional realities. Thinking about emotional marketing changes emotional experience.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_kroko.manifestation: Awareness of emotion commodification becomes part of emotional experience itself

text_image_fusion.description: Cultural commercial rhetoric, absurd integration, logical structure of offers

crocodile_human_hybrid.description: Philosophical identity questions, psychological internalization, metaphorical integration

graffiti_style_text.description: Cultural street aesthetics, ironic presentation, absurd commercial casualness

absent_tears.description: Philosophical absence, paradoxical representation, meta-commentary on visualization

ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.c_philosophical: Can AI analyze authenticity vs. availability without moralizing? Can it work with degraded meaning systems?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.l_cultural: Can AI recognize commercial rhetoric as cultural discourse? Can it track symbol commodification processes?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.d_logical: Can AI work with emotional economics as logical system? Can it analyze value calculation in non-material contexts?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.layer_transformations: Can AI detect how perspectives shift layers in commodification context?

with_sparrow.contrast: Sparrow: cultural proverb transformation; Krokodýl: cultural symbol commodification

with_donkey.contrast: Donkey: logical breakdown; Krokodýl: logical application to emotions

with_others.shared_perspectives: Each benchmark tests different perspective configurations, creating comprehensive cognitive mapping

note: This guide supplements but does not replace cognitive_framework.json. It shows how the universal perspectives manifest specifically in the Krokodýl story's context of emotion commodification.
